title: Television: behind the scenes
creator_credit: Alan P. Sloan, Charles Sutton, Avatar Learning and Encyclopaedia Britannica Educational Corporation
brief_description: Shows how a weekly variety television programme is produced. Explores the responsibilities of the producer, director, writer, art director, technicians and performers.
